text.name: Robe Of Salvation
text.description:
{Robe Of Salvation}

Robe Of Salvation makes commander immunity to armageddon spell.
text.event: You step into a sacred trial ground, where an angel greets you and puts you through a small trial. After passing the trial, she deems you capable of protecting this world and gifts you a cloak. You quickly realize that this is the legendary Robe of Salvation.
